definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="slot_item">slot_item</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:slot_item</field><value name="VAL"><block type="itemhandler_get_slot"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="variables_get_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:slot_item</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.FIRE_CHARGE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="gui_remove_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure"><field name="procedure"></field></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
